DSCI_511.label: DSCI 511
DSCI_511.name: Programming for Data Science
DSCI_511.description: Program design and structure. Flow control, iteration, lists, and functions. Program design and data manipulation with Python and R.

DSCI_521.label: DSCI 521
DSCI_521.name: Computing Platforms for Data Science
DSCI_521.description: The Unix shell, version control (Git/GitHub), and problem-solving strategies. Virtual environments and the data scientific software stack.

DSCI_523.label: DSCI 523
DSCI_523.name: Data Wrangling
DSCI_523.description: Program design and data manipulation using Tidyverse and Pandas. Organizing, filtering, sorting, and cleaning data for analysis.

DSCI_551.label: DSCI 551
DSCI_551.name: Stats & Prob for Data Science
DSCI_551.description: Descriptive statistics, random variables, and distributions. Fundamental concepts in probability including conditional and joint distributions.
